name: [WIP] going home 🪶
description:
An unfinished entry for the 'duck' Bitsy jam- trying out some new hacks this time:) It's odd working on a project that isn't required college work for once... 

If you come back in the future I might have crawled out of hiberation to give this game an ending. My goal is to make it long (Which in my terms means longer than my usual 2 minute thingies, lol)

Hacks used: directional avatars follower smooth moves transparent sprites unique items
